lines.name: Emperor's Mastery

explicitModifiers.text: (5-7)% increased Attributes
4% increased maximum Life
3% increased Character Size
5% increased Global Defences

lines.flavourText:
Learn as much as you can, 
and surround yourself with people who know the rest.

lines.name: Emperor's Wit

explicitModifiers.text: (4-6)% increased Intelligence
30% increased Global Critical Strike Chance
3% increased Character Size

lines.flavourText:
Language is a tool that can be used to build walls 
or tear them down.

lines.name: Voices
lines.flavourText: Only a madman would ignore a god's instructions.

lines.name: Unending Hunger

implicitModifiers.text: 1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit
10% reduced Effect of Chill on you

explicitModifiers.text: Minions have (6-8)% increased Area of Effect
With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Raised Spectres have a 50% chance to gain Soul Eater for 20 seconds on Kill

lines.flavourText:
They roamed, they fed, they grew,
Killing as they went,
Conquer though they may,
Their hearts will never be content.

lines.name: Calamitous Visions

explicitModifiers.text: Adds Lone Messenger

lines.flavourText:
"Try as I might, I could not escape it.
When I closed my eyes, I saw only death.
Each breath tainted with the scent of seared and smouldering flesh,
And each sound tangled with pleas for mercy."

lines.name: One With Nothing

explicitModifiers.text: Adds Hollow Palm Technique

lines.flavourText:
Once you begin to rely on your weapons, 
You ensure you can't live without them.

lines.name: Emperor's Might

explicitModifiers.text: (5-6)% increased Strength
10% increased Damage
3% increased Character Size

lines.flavourText: Even an iron fist can be handled with grace.

lines.name: Unnatural Instinct

implicitModifiers.text: 20% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech
1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit
(5-6)% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
10% reduced Effect of Chill on you
10% reduced Effect of Shock on you
20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech

explicitModifiers.text: Allocated Small Passive Skills in Radius grant nothing
Grants all bonuses of Unallocated Small Passive Skills in Radius

lines.flavourText:
"I don't know how I know, 
I just know that I know."

lines.name: Emperor's Cunning

explicitModifiers.text: (4-6)% increased Dexterity
20% increased Global Accuracy Rating
3% increased Character Size

lines.flavourText:
The greatest victories happen
before the battle has begun.

lines.name: The Blue Nightmare

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 5% of Lightning Damage as Extra Chaos Damage

Passives granting Lightning Resistance or all Elemental Resistances in Radius
also grant Chance to Block Spell Damage at 35% of its value

Passives granting Lightning Resistance or all Elemental Resistances in Radius
also grant an equal chance to gain a Power Charge on Kill

lines.flavourText:
We swell and flood
and drown the undeserving beneath our might.

lines.name: The Red Nightmare

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 5% of Fire Damage as Extra Chaos Damage

Passives granting Fire Resistance or all Elemental Resistances in Radius
also grant Chance to Block Attack Damage at 35% of its value

Passives granting Fire Resistance or all Elemental Resistances in Radius
also grant an equal chance to gain an Endurance Charge on Kill

lines.flavourText:
We coagulate; a crimson shell
that suffocates the unworthy.

lines.name: The Green Nightmare

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 5% of Cold Damage as Extra Chaos Damage

Passives granting Cold Resistance or all Elemental Resistances in Radius
also grant Chance to Dodge Attack Hits at 35% of its value

Passives granting Cold Resistance or all Elemental Resistances in Radius
also grant an equal chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Kill

lines.flavourText:
We take root in the dirt
and strangle those who tread upon it.

lines.name: Glorious Vanity

implicitModifiers.text: (5-6)% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
10% reduced Effect of Shock on you
1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit
20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
10% reduced Effect of Chill on you
20% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech

explicitModifiers.text:
Bathed in the blood of (103-7990) sacrificed in the name of Doryani
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Vaal

Bathed in the blood of (102-7999) sacrificed in the name of Xibaqua
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Vaal

Bathed in the blood of (100-7990) sacrificed in the name of Ahuana
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Vaal
Historic

lines.flavourText: They believed themselves the pinnacle of civilisation, but that height toppled their empire.

lines.name: Natural Affinity

explicitModifiers.text: Adds Nature's Patience

lines.flavourText:
You can take the girl out of the woods, 
but you can't take the woods out of the girl.

lines.name: Transcendent Mind

implicitModifiers.text: 10% reduced Effect of Chill on you
10% reduced Effect of Shock on you
4% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills

explicitModifiers.text: -1 Intelligence per 1 Intelligence on Allocated Passives in Radius
+3% to Damage over Time Multiplier per 10 Intelligence on Unallocated Passives in Radius
3% increased Mana Recovery Rate per 10 Intelligence on Allocated Passives in Radius
2% reduced Mana Recovery Rate per 10 Intelligence on Unallocated Passives in Radius

lines.flavourText:
A keen mind sees what others do not,
makes connections where others do not, 
and is dangerous in a way that others are not.

lines.name: Transcendent Flesh

implicitModifiers.text: 10% reduced Effect of Shock on you
(4-6)% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit

explicitModifiers.text: -1 Strength per 1 Strength on Allocated Passives in Radius
+7% to Critical Strike Multiplier per 10 Strength on Unallocated Passives in Radius
3% increased Life Recovery Rate per 10 Strength on Allocated Passives in Radius
2% reduced Life Recovery Rate per 10 Strength on Unallocated Passives in Radius

lines.flavourText:
We are as much shaped by what we do
as what is done to us.

lines.name: Transcendent Spirit

implicitModifiers.text: 1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit

explicitModifiers.text: -1 Dexterity per 1 Dexterity on Allocated Passives in Radius
3% increased Movement Speed per 10 Dexterity on Allocated Passives in Radius
+125 to Accuracy Rating per 10 Dexterity on Unallocated Passives in Radius
2% reduced Movement Speed per 10 Dexterity on Unallocated Passives in Radius

lines.flavourText:
Take comfort knowing that, even in death,
we may serve our Queen and fuel her empire.

lines.name: The Anima Stone

implicitModifiers.text: 10% reduced Effect of Shock on you
20% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech
1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to maximum number of Golems
+1 to maximum number of Summoned Golems if you have 3 Primordial Items Socketed or Equipped

lines.flavourText:
All revere the earth they walk,
For it wields strength beyond compare,
Holds knowledge more than thought,
Stands long after all else falls.

lines.name: Inspired Learning

implicitModifiers.text: 6% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
20% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech
1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit
20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
10% reduced Effect of Shock on you

explicitModifiers.text: With 4 Notables Allocated in Radius, When you Kill a Rare monster, you gain 1 of its Modifiers for 20 seconds

lines.flavourText:
If you do not learn from a won battle
then you have already lost the war.

lines.name: Kitava's Teachings

explicitModifiers.text: Adds Disciple of Kitava

lines.flavourText:
Savour the bitter, cherish the sweet,
For there may never be another chance to eat.

lines.name: Megalomaniac
lines.flavourText: If you're going to act like you're better than everyone else, make sure you are.

lines.flavourText:
One by one, they stood their ground against a creature 
they had no hope of understanding, let alone defeating,
and one by one, they became a part of it.

lines.flavourText: Thoughts that shimmer like light across the rain.

lines.name: Grand Spectrum

implicitModifiers.text: 10% reduced Effect of Chill on you
1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit
20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech

explicitModifiers.text: 15% increased Elemental Damage per Grand Spectrum

lines.flavourText: Fists that strike like a falling tree.

lines.name: Tempered Flesh

implicitModifiers.text: 10% reduced Effect of Shock on you

explicitModifiers.text: -1 Strength per 1 Strength on Allocated Passives in Radius
2% increased Life Recovery Rate per 10 Strength on Allocated Passives in Radius

lines.flavourText:
We are born raw and untested, and we are shaped by life.

<default>{This item can be transformed on the Altar of Sacrifice along with Vial of Transcendence}

lines.name: The Front Line

explicitModifiers.text: Adds Veteran's Awareness

lines.flavourText:
It was a great honour to fight at the front. 
The few that survived the initial charge were guaranteed fame and fortune.

lines.name: The Siege

implicitModifiers.text: 1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit

explicitModifiers.text: Adds Kineticism

lines.flavourText:
As the dead battered Highgate's barricades,
The Black Sekhema accepted her fate,
And stood her ground.

lines.name: Ancient Waystones
lines.flavourText:
"The Vaal left a thousand warnings behind.
We ignored every single one."
- Siosa, the Last Scholar

lines.name: Blood Sacrifice
lines.flavourText: Power always comes with a price.

lines.name: Brawn

implicitModifiers.text: 10% reduced Effect of Shock on you
(5-6)% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit
20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
20% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech

explicitModifiers.text: (4-6)% increased Strength
(4-6)% increased Dexterity
(10-15)% reduced Intelligence

lines.flavourText:
"Take your time, make all your plans. 
Then tell me which plan
pulls my axe from your ribs."
- Barkhul, the Butcher

lines.name: Brittle Barrier
lines.flavourText: Walls built in a hurry fall in a hurry.

lines.name: Brute Force Solution

implicitModifiers.text: 1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit
10% reduced Effect of Shock on you
10% reduced Effect of Chill on you

explicitModifiers.text: +(16-24) to Intelligence
Strength from Passives in Radius is Transformed to Intelligence

lines.flavourText:
Picking a lock takes an immense amount of skill and practice.
Breaking it with a hammer takes about three seconds.

lines.name: Careful Planning

implicitModifiers.text: 3% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
10% reduced Effect of Chill on you
1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit

explicitModifiers.text: +(16-24) to Dexterity
Intelligence from Passives in Radius is Transformed to Dexterity

lines.flavourText:
"Greatly outnumbered, Deshret dressed her personal guard 
in identical garb. When the Empire rode north, Deshret and 
her guard took turns revealing themselves, creating the illusion 
of speed beyond the capabilities of even the Virtue Gems."
- History of the Maraketh

lines.name: Chill of Corruption
lines.flavourText:
Even a millennium later, Atziri's presence
casts a shroud over Wraeclast.

lines.name: Coated Shrapnel

implicitModifiers.text: 20% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech
5% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
10% reduced Effect of Chill on you

explicitModifiers.text: Traps and Mines have a 25% chance to Poison on Hit
Passive Skills in Radius also grant: Traps and Mines deal (2-3) to (4-6) added Physical Damage

lines.flavourText:
The Ezomytes have a saying:
Take everything and waste nothing.

lines.name: Cold Steel

implicitModifiers.text: 20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
20% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech

explicitModifiers.text: Increases and Reductions to Physical Damage in Radius are Transformed to apply to Cold Damage
Increases and Reductions to Cold Damage in Radius are Transformed to apply to Physical Damage

lines.flavourText:
Winter provides us with her own weapons,
hanging from the eaves of our homes.

lines.name: Combustibles
lines.flavourText: The hotter something burns, the less is left at the end.

lines.name: Conqueror's Efficiency

explicitModifiers.text: 3% reduced Mana Cost of Skills
4% increased Skill Effect Duration
2% reduced Mana Reserved

lines.flavourText: The stone may yet bleed.

lines.name: Conqueror's Potency

explicitModifiers.text: 4% increased Effect of your Curses
Flasks applied to you have 8% increased Effect
3% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills

lines.flavourText: What you earn is almost as important as what you take.

lines.name: Corrupted Energy
lines.flavourText: Nothing is immune to the Nightmare's twisted influence.

lines.name: Dead Reckoning

implicitModifiers.text: 10% reduced Effect of Shock on you
1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit
10% reduced Effect of Chill on you

explicitModifiers.text: Minions have +(7-10)% to all Elemental Resistances
With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Summon Skeletons can Summon up to 15 Skeleton Mages

lines.flavourText:
A mage from the coast rode up on a broken nag, legs burnt to his bones.
Before he collapsed, he uttered:
"I watched the world we know end yesterday."

lines.name: Eldritch Knowledge

implicitModifiers.text: 10% reduced Effect of Chill on you
1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit

explicitModifiers.text: 5% increased Chaos Damage per 10 Intelligence from Allocated Passives in Radius

lines.flavourText:
"True Thaumaturgy can only be learned 
by the brilliant or the mad."
- Shavronne of Umbra

lines.name: Energised Armour

implicitModifiers.text: 20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
10% reduced Effect of Shock on you
10% reduced Effect of Chill on you

explicitModifiers.text: (15-20)% increased Armour
Increases and Reductions to Energy Shield in Radius are Transformed to apply to Armour at 200% of their value

lines.flavourText: "I've yet to see prayer stop an arrow."

lines.name: Fertile Mind

implicitModifiers.text: 20% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech
1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit
10% reduced Effect of Shock on you
10% reduced Effect of Chill on you
4% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills

explicitModifiers.text: +(16-24) to Intelligence
Dexterity from Passives in Radius is Transformed to Intelligence

lines.flavourText:
"The swallow flew fast and took many turns,
spilling a seed where no plant had grown before. 
This seed grew and grew until the desert became fertile and abundant. 
Your mind is like this seed." 
- Maraketh Proverb

lines.name: Fevered Mind
lines.flavourText: In sickness, the insane becomes sane.

lines.name: Fireborn

implicitModifiers.text: 1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit

explicitModifiers.text: Increases and Reductions to other Damage Types in Radius are Transformed to apply to Fire Damage

lines.flavourText:
Leaders are not born in times of peace.
Leaders are born in ruins and flames.

lines.name: Fluid Motion

implicitModifiers.text: 20% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech
1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit
10% reduced Effect of Chill on you

explicitModifiers.text: +(16-24) to Dexterity
Strength from Passives in Radius is Transformed to Dexterity

lines.flavourText: Even the strongest of steel can be made to bend.

lines.name: Fragility
lines.flavourText: "Your flesh will fail you."

lines.name: Grand Spectrum

implicitModifiers.text: 20% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech
10% reduced Effect of Chill on you

explicitModifiers.text: +7% to all Elemental Resistances per Grand Spectrum

lines.flavourText: Skin like steel tempered by bright flames.

lines.name: Growing Agony

implicitModifiers.text: 1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit
10% reduced Effect of Shock on you
10% reduced Effect of Chill on you
20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech

explicitModifiers.text: (8-12)% increased Damage over Time
With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Viper Strike deals 2% increased Damage with Hits and Poison for each Poison on the Enemy
With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Viper Strike has a 10% chance per Poison on Enemy to grant Unholy Might for 4 seconds on Hit

lines.flavourText:
Maligaro understood that devotion to science,
Means devotion to trial and error.
For Maligaro's errors, death was slow,
And very painful.

lines.name: Hair Trigger

explicitModifiers.text: (15-25)% increased Trap Damage
(40-60)% increased Trap Trigger Area of Effect

lines.flavourText:
Anyone can catch a lumbering beast.
Try catching a bird before it has even landed.

lines.name: Hidden Potential

implicitModifiers.text: 10% reduced Effect of Chill on you

explicitModifiers.text: (20-25)% increased Damage for each Magic Item Equipped

lines.flavourText:
The difference between the master and his apprentice
is what they see when they look at the same block of wood.

lines.name: Hungry Abyss
lines.flavourText: Darkness can never be sated.

lines.name: Izaro's Turmoil

explicitModifiers.text: (18-25)% increased Fire Damage
(18-25)% increased Cold Damage
2% chance to Ignite
2% chance to Freeze

lines.flavourText:
The once-glorious emperor spent his final days
imprisoned in his greatest creation;
a tool to filter out the unworthy
that pushed a monster to power.

lines.name: Mantra of Flames

implicitModifiers.text: 10% reduced Effect of Shock on you
1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit
6% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (3-5) to (8-12) Fire Attack Damage per Buff on you
Adds (2-3) to (5-8) Fire Spell Damage per Buff on you

lines.flavourText: The strong grow stronger still.

lines.name: Martial Artistry

implicitModifiers.text: 10% reduced Effect of Shock on you
20% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech
4% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills

explicitModifiers.text: +(3-4) to Melee Strike Range while Unarmed
Passive Skills in Radius also grant: 1% increased Attack Speed with Unarmed Attacks

lines.flavourText: A gentle hand rarely leaves a mark on the world.

lines.name: Mutated Growth
lines.flavourText:
Few living things survived the cleansing flames.
Those that did thrived... 
And changed...

lines.name: Pacifism
lines.flavourText: "Your fear will overcome you."

lines.name: Powerlessness
lines.flavourText: "Your desires will mislead you."

lines.name: Rain of Splinters

implicitModifiers.text: 1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit

explicitModifiers.text: (30-50)% reduced Totem Damage
Totems fire 2 additional Projectiles

lines.flavourText:
"If one is an annoyance
then a hundred is a threat."
- Ancient Karui Proverb

lines.name: Rapid Expansion

implicitModifiers.text: 20% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech
(3-4)% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
10% reduced Effect of Chill on you
20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech

explicitModifiers.text: (8-12)% increased Global Physical Damage

With at least 40 Strength in Radius, Ground Slam has a 35% chance
to grant an Endurance Charge when you Stun an Enemy

With at least 40 Strength in Radius, Ground Slam
has a 50% increased angle

lines.flavourText:
Chitus began to aggressively expand his empire
into neighbouring nations at great human cost. 
But for absolute power, there is no price 
that a Perandus won't pay.

lines.name: Reckless Defence

implicitModifiers.text: 10% reduced Effect of Shock on you

explicitModifiers.text: +(2-4)% Chance to Block Spell Damage
+(2-4)% Chance to Block Attack Damage
Hits have (140-200)% increased Critical Strike Chance against you

lines.flavourText:
There's no motivation for genius
quite like desperation.

lines.name: Rolling Flames

implicitModifiers.text: 6% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
10% reduced Effect of Chill on you
20% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech
20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Fire Damage
With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Fireball cannot ignite
With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Fireball has +(30-50)% chance to inflict scorch

lines.flavourText:
From north to south the sea of fire swept,
Rolling waves of gorging flame,
Growing taller and hungrier,
With every land they consumed.

lines.name: Sacrificial Harvest
lines.flavourText:
The Vaal used human sacrifice to power their empire.
They, too, eventually sought means to 
make their machines run more efficiently.

lines.name: Self-Flagellation
lines.flavourText: Beg for forgiveness.

lines.name: Spirit Guards

implicitModifiers.text: 1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit

explicitModifiers.text: Minions deal (8-12)% increased Damage
With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Animate Weapon can Animate up to 12 Ranged Weapons

lines.flavourText:
Long after the Karui passed through,
the whispers of those who stood their ground
at Lioneye's Watch could be heard amongst the rubble.

lines.name: The Vigil

implicitModifiers.text: 5% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Armour

With at least 40 Strength in Radius, Vigilant Strike
Fortifies you and Nearby Allies for 12 seconds

lines.flavourText:
When Voll took the throne,
He swore to care for the empire with eyes open.
And so he looked to the salvation of his people,
Blind to the damnation in his hands.

lines.name: Vaal Sentencing
lines.flavourText:
In their final days, every crime was punishable by death.
Atziri's empire ran on blood, but the blood was running dry.

lines.name: Weight of Sin
lines.flavourText: Ill will is the greatest of burdens.

lines.name: Winter's Bounty

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Cold Damage

With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Cold Snap grants Power Charges instead of Frenzy Charges when Enemies die in its Area
With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Cold Snap's Cooldown can be bypassed by Power Charges instead of Frenzy Charges

lines.flavourText:
As a boy, Rigwald was taught to hunt,
Through the first snows of winter,
When beasts have gorged their fill,
And see nothing but the long slumber ahead.

lines.name: Fight for Survival

implicitModifiers.text: 5% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
10% reduced Effect of Shock on you
1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit
20% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Cold Damage

With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Melee Damage
dealt by Frost Blades Penetrates 15% Cold Resistance
With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Frost Blades has 25% increased Projectile Speed

lines.flavourText:
The winter that followed the Cataclysm was especially harsh.
Wraeclast's few survivors fought to the death for the last scraps of bread.

lines.name: Inevitability

implicitModifiers.text: 10% reduced Effect of Chill on you

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Fire Damage
With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Magma Orb deals 50% less Damage
With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Magma Orb deals 40% more Damage per Chain

With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Magma Orb
has 10% increased Area of Effect per Chain

lines.flavourText:
Izaro gave rise to Chitus.
Chitus gave rise to Voll.
None could know how it would end.
None could stop it.

lines.name: Wildfire

implicitModifiers.text: 20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
(3-4)% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit
10% reduced Effect of Shock on you
10% reduced Effect of Chill on you

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Fire Damage
With at least 40 Strength in Radius, Molten Strike Projectiles Chain on impacting ground
With at least 40 Strength in Radius, Molten Strike Projectiles Chain +1 time
With at least 40 Strength in Radius, Molten Strike fires 50% less Projectiles

lines.flavourText:
News of Kaom's victory in the south spread quickly.
Those in support of the coming rebellion bided their time.
The rest fled like rats from a fire.

lines.name: Ring of Blades

implicitModifiers.text: 3% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
20% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech
10% reduced Effect of Chill on you

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Global Physical Damage
With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Ethereal Knives fires 5 additional Projectiles
With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Ethereal Knives fires Projectiles in a circle

lines.flavourText:
At night, as a young Daresso shared his bed with a woman whose name he could not recall,
his thoughts remained in the one place he called his own: The Grand Arena.

lines.name: Might and Influence

implicitModifiers.text: 20% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech
20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Attack Damage

With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Dual Strike has (20-30)% increased
Accuracy Rating while wielding a Sword

With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Dual Strike deals Splash Damage
to surrounding targets while wielding a Mace

With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Dual Strike has +(20-30)% to Critical Strike
Multiplier while wielding a Dagger

With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Dual Strike has (10-15)% increased Attack
Speed while wielding a Claw

With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Dual Strike Hits Intimidate Enemies for
4 seconds while wielding an Axe

lines.flavourText:
Emperor Chitus could offer you a gift with one hand,
and drive a blade into your back with the other.
His blend of brutality and charisma cultured a potent 
mixture of fear and admiration among the masses.

lines.name: First Snow

implicitModifiers.text: 1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit
(4-5)% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
10% reduced Effect of Shock on you

explicitModifiers.text: (7-10)% increased Projectile Damage
With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Freezing Pulse fires 2 additional Projectiles

With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, 25% increased Freezing Pulse Damage if
you've Shattered an Enemy Recently

lines.flavourText:
Cadiro watched young Chitus play in the frostbitten grass, care-free, happy,
and unburdened by the responsibility the Perandus scion would soon endure.

lines.name: Frozen Trail

implicitModifiers.text: 10% reduced Effect of Chill on you
10% reduced Effect of Shock on you
20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech

explicitModifiers.text: (7-10)% increased Projectile Damage
With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Frostbolt fires 2 additional Projectiles
With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Frostbolt Projectiles gain 40% increased Projectile Speed per second

lines.flavourText:
The Maraketh knew that a mountain path
free of vegetation was cut by regular avalanches,
and so the advancing Eternals were unwittingly drawn into a deathtrap.

lines.name: Winter Burial

implicitModifiers.text: 10% reduced Effect of Shock on you
1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Cold Damage

With at least 40 Strength in Radius, Glacial Hammer deals
Cold-only Splash Damage to surrounding targets

With at least 40 Strength in Radius, 25% of Glacial
Hammer Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage

lines.flavourText:
Exposure led to the deaths of many slaves.
And it was the duty of slaves to bury the dead in the frozen ground.
A growing circle of misery and death 
that the elite were all too happy to sustain.

lines.name: Hazardous Research

implicitModifiers.text: 1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit
10% reduced Effect of Chill on you

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Lightning Damage
With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Spark fires 2 additional Projectiles
With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Spark fires Projectiles in a circle
(15-20)% reduced Spark Duration

lines.flavourText:
Of the elements at the thaumaturgist's disposal, lightning remained the least understood.
The simple passage of energy from one to another could result in profound power, or rapid death.

lines.name: Spreading Rot

implicitModifiers.text: 10% reduced Effect of Chill on you
(3-6)% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech

explicitModifiers.text: (7-13)% increased Chaos Damage
With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Blight inflicts Withered for 2 seconds
With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Blight has 50% increased Hinder Duration

lines.flavourText:
The Cataclysm was but the first act in a play of horrors.
The dead lingered, and the living began to rot.

lines.name: To Dust

explicitModifiers.text: (10-20)% reduced Skeleton Duration
Minions deal (8-12)% increased Damage
(7-10)% increased Skeleton Attack Speed
(7-10)% increased Skeleton Cast Speed
(3-5)% increased Skeleton Movement Speed

lines.flavourText:
In the end, time comes for all of us.
For some, it comes much sooner.

lines.name: From Dust

implicitModifiers.text: 5% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
10% reduced Effect of Chill on you

explicitModifiers.text: Summon 4 additional Skeleton Warriors with Summon Skeleton
+1 second to Summon Skeleton Cooldown

lines.flavourText:
"Would you leave an orchard of apples to rot unharvested?
A cemetery is no different." 
-Kadavrus, Surgeon to the Umbra

lines.name: The Golden Rule

implicitModifiers.text: 20% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech
10% reduced Effect of Shock on you

explicitModifiers.text: (30-40)% increased Armour while Bleeding
Bleeding you inflict is Reflected to you
+1% to Chaos Resistance per Poison on you
Poison you inflict is Reflected to you if you have fewer than 100 Poisons on you

lines.flavourText: Hurt as you would be hurt.

lines.name: Soul's Wick

implicitModifiers.text: 20% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech
5% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to maximum number of Spectres
(40-50)% reduced Mana Cost of Raise Spectre
Spectres have (800-1000)% increased Critical Strike Chance

Spectres have a Base Duration of 20 seconds
Spectres do not travel between Areas

lines.flavourText:
Candles with the brightest light
Bring life to death and day to night.
But lovely as the glow may seem,
Their light is fleeting, as a dream...

lines.name: The Long Winter

implicitModifiers.text: 20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Cold Damage
With 40 Intelligence in Radius, Glacial Cascade has an additional Burst

With 40 Intelligence in Radius, 20% of Glacial Cascade Physical Damage
Converted to Cold Damage

lines.flavourText:
In the years that followed the twisted sky,
cold winds cloaked Wraeclast in snow.
The pure-white blanket masked a black heart
that lay dormant deep beneath the earth.

lines.name: Combat Focus

implicitModifiers.text: 20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
With 40 total Strength and Intelligence in Radius, Elemental Hit and Wild Strike deal 50% less Cold Damage
With 40 total Strength and Intelligence in Radius, Elemental Hit and Wild Strike cannot choose Cold

lines.flavourText:
Kaom watched the torches patrol the top of the Watch. 
He observed the lay of the beach, its barricades and rocks, 
and his men in their canoes, ready to lay their lives down for him.
But when his foot hit the sand, he thought only of the fight.

lines.name: Tempered Mind

implicitModifiers.text: 10% reduced Effect of Shock on you
10% reduced Effect of Chill on you

explicitModifiers.text: -1 Intelligence per 1 Intelligence on Allocated Passives in Radius
2% increased Mana Recovery Rate per 10 Intelligence on Allocated Passives in Radius

lines.flavourText:
Any thought, no matter how fleeting, changes the thinker.

<default>{This item can be transformed on the Altar of Sacrifice along with Vial of Transcendence}

lines.name: Tempered Spirit

implicitModifiers.text: 6% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
20% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech

explicitModifiers.text: -1 Dexterity per 1 Dexterity on Allocated Passives in Radius
2% increased Movement Speed per 10 Dexterity on Allocated Passives in Radius

lines.flavourText:
Though the body rots, the spirit lives on.

<default>{This item can be transformed on the Altar of Sacrifice along with Vial of Transcendence}

lines.name: Combat Focus

implicitModifiers.text: 10% reduced Effect of Chill on you
3% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
With 40 total Intelligence and Dexterity in Radius, Elemental Hit and Wild Strike deal 50% less Fire Damage
With 40 total Intelligence and Dexterity in Radius, Elemental Hit and Wild Strike cannot choose Fire

lines.flavourText:
Voll stood at the gates of Sarn, and a nation stood behind him. 
He thought of the righteousness of his cause, 
and of the glory he would bring to the empire he would soon lead. 
But as Chitus and his gemlings advanced, he thought only of the fight.

lines.name: Combat Focus

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
With 40 total Dexterity and Strength in Radius, Elemental Hit and Wild Strike deal 50% less Lightning Damage
With 40 total Dexterity and Strength in Radius, Elemental Hit and Wild Strike cannot choose Lightning

lines.flavourText:
Standing behind iron bars,
Daresso thought of his adoring fans cheering his name, 
his wife's warm embrace waiting for him, 
and of the celebrations that would soon be thrown in his name.
But when the arena gate lifted, he thought only of the fight.

lines.name: Divide and Conquer

implicitModifiers.text: 20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
10% reduced Effect of Shock on you
1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Attack Damage while holding a Shield
With 40 total Dexterity and Strength in Radius, Spectral Shield Throw Chains +4 times
With 40 total Dexterity and Strength in Radius, Spectral Shield Throw fires Shard Projectiles when Chaining
With 40 total Dexterity and Strength in Radius, Spectral Shield Throw fires 75% less Shard Projectiles

lines.name: Hotheaded

implicitModifiers.text: 10% reduced Effect of Chill on you
6% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills

explicitModifiers.text: (10-20)% increased Movement Speed while Ignited
(10-20)% increased Attack Speed while Ignited
(10-20)% increased Cast Speed while Ignited

lines.flavourText: It's hard to stay still when you're engulfed in flames.

lines.name: Spirited Response

implicitModifiers.text: (4-5)% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills

explicitModifiers.text: (7-10)% increased maximum Mana
With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, 10% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit if you've Warcried Recently

lines.flavourText:
The Purity Rebels fought with heart and soul,
To free their empire from corruption.
And the fires of war did merely serve,
To temper the steel of their spirits.

lines.name: Omen on the Winds

implicitModifiers.text: 20% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech
(5-6)% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
10% reduced Effect of Chill on you
10% reduced Effect of Shock on you

explicitModifiers.text: (15-20)% increased Damage with Hits against Chilled Enemies
With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Ice Shot has 25% increased Area of Effect
With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Ice Shot Pierces 3 additional Targets

lines.flavourText:
As Malachai stepped into the Highgate mines,
cold winds billowed from the mountain above.
One final, feeble attempt to save what was meant to be eternal.

lines.name: Atziri's Reign
lines.flavourText:
Atziri went to great lengths to ensure her immortality,
but nothing is eternal.

lines.name: Malicious Intent

implicitModifiers.text: 20% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech
10% reduced Effect of Shock on you
10% reduced Effect of Chill on you

explicitModifiers.text: 5% chance to Gain Unholy Might for 4 seconds on Melee Kill

lines.flavourText: Each life taken makes the next a little easier.

lines.name: Might in All Forms

implicitModifiers.text: 10% reduced Effect of Chill on you

explicitModifiers.text: Dexterity and Intelligence from passives in Radius count towards Strength Melee Damage bonus

lines.flavourText: True strength can be found anywhere, and in anything.

lines.name: Inertia

implicitModifiers.text: 1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit
20% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech

explicitModifiers.text: +(16-24) to Strength
Dexterity from Passives in Radius is Transformed to Strength

lines.flavourText: There is no force without movement.

lines.name: Steel Spirit

implicitModifiers.text: 10% reduced Effect of Chill on you

explicitModifiers.text: (7-10)% increased Projectile Damage
With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, each Spectral Throw Projectile gains 5% increased Damage each time it Hits

lines.flavourText:
The Sekhema rode to the mountain,
With her tribe, devoted and strong.
And sewed shut the mouth of nightmare,
So that it would not consume her world.

lines.name: Volley Fire

implicitModifiers.text: 10% reduced Effect of Shock on you
20% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech
10% reduced Effect of Chill on you

explicitModifiers.text: (7-10)% increased Projectile Damage
With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Barrage fires an additional 6 projectiles simultaneously on the first and final attacks

lines.flavourText:
Lioneye's men stood at the walls,
eyeing the savages that walked the beach below.
With a single word,
a thousand bodies, and ten thousand arrows,
would litter the sands.

lines.name: Assassin's Haste

explicitModifiers.text: 10% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
4% increased Movement Speed
4% increased Attack and Cast Speed

lines.flavourText: A quick step can advance great plans.

lines.name: Cheap Construction

implicitModifiers.text: 20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
10% reduced Effect of Shock on you
1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit
4% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills

explicitModifiers.text: 10% reduced Trap Duration
Can have up to 1 additional Trap placed at a time

lines.flavourText: Why waste the good stuff on something that's going to blow up?

lines.name: Conqueror's Longevity

explicitModifiers.text: 3% chance to Avoid Elemental Ailments
8% increased Life Recovery from Flasks
2% chance to Dodge Attack Hits

lines.flavourText: Victory is as simple as being the last one standing.

lines.name: Fragile Bloom

implicitModifiers.text: 1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 1 Fragile Regrowth each second
Maximum 10 Fragile Regrowth
0.7% of Life Regenerated per second per Fragile Regrowth
Lose all Fragile Regrowth when Hit

lines.flavourText:
The first green shoots of Spring are the most resilient,
and the most vulnerable.

lines.name: Poacher's Aim

explicitModifiers.text: Projectiles Pierce an additional Target
10% increased Projectile Damage

lines.flavourText: A sharp eye can be more deadly than a sharp blade.

lines.name: Pugilist

implicitModifiers.text: 1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Evasion Rating per 3 Dexterity Allocated in Radius
1% increased Claw Physical Damage per 3 Dexterity Allocated in Radius
1% increased Melee Physical Damage with Unarmed Attacks per 3 Dexterity Allocated in Radius

lines.flavourText: The best dancers often make the best fighters.

lines.name: Spire of Stone

implicitModifiers.text: 1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit

explicitModifiers.text: 3% increased Totem Life per 10 Strength Allocated in Radius
Totems cannot be Stunned

lines.flavourText:
The strongest Karui tribes left the longest impressions on the land.
Their symbols served as guidance many generations
after their creators had been buried deep beneath the earth.

lines.name: Static Electricity

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 2 Lightning Damage to Attacks
Adds 1 maximum Lightning Damage to Attacks per 1 Dexterity Allocated in Radius

lines.flavourText:
"Movement expends energy, but perhaps a little of that energy
can be recaptured and... reappropriated."
- Inquisitor Maligaro

lines.name: Survival Instincts

explicitModifiers.text: +20 to Dexterity
+6% to all Elemental Resistances

lines.flavourText: Observe and master your surroundings.

lines.name: Survival Secrets

explicitModifiers.text: Regenerate 3 Mana per second
10% increased Elemental Damage

lines.flavourText: Nature provides its own solutions.

lines.name: Survival Skills

explicitModifiers.text: 10% increased Global Physical Damage
+50 to Armour

lines.flavourText: A helping hand has long reach.

lines.name: Unstable Payload

implicitModifiers.text: 10% reduced Effect of Shock on you

explicitModifiers.text: (8-12)% Chance for Traps to Trigger an additional time

lines.flavourText: Saboteurs, like chefs, have their own secret recipes.

lines.name: Warlord's Reach

explicitModifiers.text: 8% increased Attack Damage
+1 to Melee Strike Range

lines.flavourText: A steady hand can hold back an army.

lines.name: Weight of the Empire

implicitModifiers.text: 4% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
10% reduced Effect of Chill on you

explicitModifiers.text: (8-12)% increased Global Physical Damage

With at least 40 Strength in Radius, Heavy Strike has a 
20% chance to deal Double Damage

lines.flavourText:
Ondar not only betrayed his emperor,
He betrayed his friend.
And in his dying moments, Chitus ensured,
That Ondar felt the full weight of his guilt.

lines.name: Overwhelming Odds

implicitModifiers.text: 20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Global Physical Damage
With at least 40 Strength in Radius, Cleave grants Fortify on Hit

With at least 40 Strength in Radius, Cleave has +1 to Radius per Nearby
Enemy, up to 10

lines.flavourText:
Even as the tide turned, and victory swiftly became impossible,
the legionnaires of Lioneye's Watch stood their ground and fought on,
every last man dying a brutal, but honourable death.
